revised_title: Exploration and Description of the Temple of Serapis at Pozzuoli
tldr: The author provides a detailed account of the Temple of Serapis at Pozzuoli, including its history, architectural features, and discoveries made during its excavation. The temple is described as a magnificent structure built with marble and dedicated to the worship of Serapis. The author also discusses the various chambers and rooms within the temple, as well as the artifacts found during the excavation.
